author: Gamers Nexus
description:
SUPPORT THE AI DYSTOPIA REPORT SERIES: https://store.gamersnexus.net/ai-dystopia
A lot has happened since our AI GPU Black Market video, and in particular, the GPU Export Controls situation has continually evolved and ... enweirdened. Because AMD can't just mislead people alone, in our opinions, now NVIDIA seemingly also has to join in. Again. In this coverage, we're recapping the GPU Export Control rules changes so far in the US and NVIDIA's statements related to them.

Learn about the special backer tiers with bonus videos and digital content: https://store.gamersnexus.net/ai-dystopia

title: NVIDIA Says We're "Fake News" | Gaslighting, GPU Bans, & Export Controls Update
